title: book_The_Making_of_Star_Wars
text:
ISBN-13: 9780345494764.
ISBN-10: 0345494768.
Title: The Making of Star Wars.
Subtitle: The Definitive Story Behind the Original Film : Based on the Lost Interviews from the Official Lucasfilm Archives.
Authors: J. W. Rinzler.
Categories: Performing Arts.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=S5IXtAEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Coinciding with the thirtieth anniversary of the first Star Wars film and including long-lost interviews and photos, a work written by a Lucasfilm staff member reveals the challenges and dramas behind the movie's creation..
Published Year: 2007.
Average Rating: 4.54.
Number of Pages: 362.
Ratings Count: 1148.
